entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -28.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 09:57 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -28.8°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -32.4°C
Wind: NW 37 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 29.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Blowing snow at times this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
